{{Wired embedded system |brand=Micronet |model=SP888B |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf=Netronix |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Kendin |cpu1_model=KS8695 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 MiB |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L64164A-7T |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:08:54 }} '''SP888B''' ''BroadLink DSL/Cable Router''
[http://www.zoobab.com/kendin-ks8695 Pics and info on '''ZooBaB.com'''] :"37NB-624D0-412" and "REV:1.2" is be silkscreened on the board. :RAM appears to be 2x '''ESMT''' M12L64164A-7T
There may be multiple revisions of this device.
